docs.abstract: Eduardo Porter Economic Scene column warns European leaders that they must implement democracy on continent-wide scale regardless of British referendum on whether to stay in European Union in order to defuse hostility against European integration; underscores necessity of national politicians giving up power to regional institutions.

headline.main: After Brexit Vote, a Choice for Europe: Move Forward, or Fall Back
